headline.main: Somalia Says 110 Dead in Last 48 Hours Due to Drought
headline.print_headline: Somalia Says 110 Dead in Last 48 Hours Due to Drought

lead_paragraph: Some 110 people have died in southern Somalia in the last two days from famine and diarrhea resulting from a drought, the prime minister said on Saturday, as the area braces itself for widespread shortages of food.
snippet: Some 110 people have died in southern Somalia in the last two days from famine and diarrhea resulting from a drought, the prime minister said on Saturday, as the area braces itself for widespread shortages of food....
